property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Erkenbrand is defending, he gains: "Response: Deal 1 damage to Erkenbrand to cancel a shadow effect just triggered."

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero with sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached hero defends against an attack and takes no damage while defending that attack, exhaust Day's Rising to add 1 resource to the attached hero's resource pool.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Warrior hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you optionally engage an enemy, exhaust Capatain of Gondor to give attached hero +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Booming Ent gets +1 Û for each damaged Ent character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Choose a non-unique enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, progress would be placed on the quest for questing successfully is instead assigned as damage to the chosen enemy. (Progress must still be placed on any active location first.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard each shadow card from each enemy in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When an encounter card is revealed but before resolving any of that card's keywords or "when revealed" effects, choose a character committed to the quest. Ready that character and remove it from the quest.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Heal all damage on each character in play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have restricted attachments. Treebeard enters play exhausted and collects 1 resource each resource phase. These resources can be used to pay for Ent cards played from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 resources from Treebeard's pool to ready an Ent character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: The first player takes control of Chief Turch. Set Raven Chief and Raven Chief’s Camp aside, out of play. Reveal 1 copy of Dunland Battlefield and make it the active location. Reveal 1 copy of Raven War-camp and add it to the staging area. Create the Raven deck (see insert) and set it next to the quest deck. Each player chooses 1 different enemy from the Raven deck and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck and Raven deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, remove 1 time counter from each location in play. Place 3 time counters on this stage.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the Raven deck discard pile into the Raven deck. Then, starting with the first player, each player takes the top card of the Raven deck and adds it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, reveal the top card of the Raven deck and add it to the staging area. Place 3 time counters on this stage.
Each location in the staging area gets +2 quest points.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Raven Chief and Raven Chief’s Camp to the staging area. Take the top X cards from the Raven deck and add them to the staging area. X is the number of players minus 1.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value:
Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this stage, each engaged enemy makes an attack. Place 2 time counters on this stage.
At the end of the round, if Raven Chief is in the victory display, the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dunland. Boar Clan.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The first player gains control of Chief Turch. Immune to player card effects. Chief Turch does not exhaust to defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Chief Turch leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dunland. Raven Clan.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have attachments. While Raven Chief’s Camp is in play, Raven Chief cannot be damaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Raven Chief attacks, remove 1 time counter from the active location, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, exhaust each damaged character. Place 3 time counters on this location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dunland. Raven Clan.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Raven Warrior engages a player, remove X time counters from locations in play. X is the number of cards in the engaged player’s hand.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player discards an attachment he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dunland. Raven Clan.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either remove 1 time counter from the active location, or reveal an additional encounter card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û, where X is the Time X value on the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, starting with the first player, each player draws the top card of the Raven deck and puts it into play engaged with him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: Time 2. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, reveal the top card of the Raven deck and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal attacking enemy 2 additional shadow cards from the Raven deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: Time 3. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of cards in his hand.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: Time 4. Forced: After the last time counter is removed from this location, each player raises his threat by the number of cards in his hand.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the Time X value on the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove 1 time counter from each location in play. Place X time counters on each location in play with no time counters on it. X is the “Time X” value on that location. If there are no locations in the staging area, Raising the Cry gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player draws 3 cards. Until the end of the round, players cannot play events.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, remove 1 time counter from the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Antlered Crown

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove all progress from each location in the staging area. Increase the total $ in the staging area by 1 for each progress removed this way. If no progress was removed by this effect, Driven Back gains surge.
